summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of StudySmart major enhancements completed. All new features working correctly: Study Groups full-screen mode with exit button, Analytics with 4 tabs (Overview, Tasks, Focus, AI Insights), AI features (Study Coach, Burnout Detection, Weekly Summary), and Planner with tasks/goals sidebar.

issues: Console warning: Chart width/height -1 - charts may not render properly on initial load. This is a Recharts library issue with container sizing.

console_warnings.message: Encountered two children with the same key (task_001, task_002, etc.)
console_warnings.impact: Non-critical - may cause rendering issues with duplicate keys

AI Burnout Check API - PASSED (returns risk level and warnings)

action_items: Minor: Fix React key warnings - ensure unique keys for task items in Dashboard and Planner
Minor: Address Recharts container sizing warning for charts
critical_code_review_comments: Study Groups full-screen mode implementation is clean with proper exit functionality
Analytics tabs are well-organized with Overview, Tasks, Focus, and AI Insights
AI features (Study Coach, Burnout Detection, Weekly Summary) are properly integrated
Planner sidebar shows pending tasks and active goals as expected
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major enhancements tested and working. Study Groups has full-screen mode with exit button (ArrowLeft icon). Analytics has 4 tabs with AI features. Planner shows tasks and goals in sidebar. Test user goaltest@test.com available. Minor console warnings about React keys and Recharts sizing exist but don't affect functionality.

features: Full-screen mode when clicking on a group
Exit button (ArrowLeft) in top left
Chat tab with message input and send button
Shared Goals tab with goal cards and +1 contribute button
Members tab with member list and XP/streak info
Primary Group badge
Set Primary button (when not primary)
Leave group button
Group Stats sidebar
Top Contributors section
Overview tab - Productivity Score, Task Completion, Focus Time, Goals Progress
Tasks tab - Priority Breakdown, Goal Progress
Focus tab - Focus Time Trend, Pomodoro Sessions chart
AI Insights tab - Study Coach, Burnout Detection, Weekly Summary
Get Advice button - fetches personalized AI advice
Check Now button - checks for burnout risk
Generate Report button - generates weekly AI summary
Daily Timeline with task and break blocks
Today's Focus section with top tasks
Pending Tasks sidebar with priority indicators and overdue badges
Active Goals sidebar with progress bars
Generate Schedule button
View mode selector (Daily/Weekly/Monthly/Yearly)
Energy level selector (Low/Medium/High)
Stats display (Planned work hours, Task blocks, Break blocks, Calendar events)
